headline: Is Procter & Gamble Offering Value After Recent Earnings and Share Price Decline?
summary: If you have ever found yourself wondering what to make of Procter & Gamble’s stock price today, you are not alone. From toothpaste in your bathroom to detergent in your laundry room, Procter & Gamble’s products are everywhere. But when it comes to investing, the company’s recent performance brings up some timely questions, especially as the stock has seen subtle shifts in sentiment over the last year. Take a look at the numbers. Over the past 12 months, Procter & Gamble’s stock has slipped...

headline: 3 Unpopular Stocks We Find Risky
summary: Wall Street has issued downbeat forecasts for the stocks in this article. These predictions are rare - financial institutions typically hesitate to say bad things about a company because it can jeopardize their other revenue-generating business lines like M&A advisory.
